title: Stakefast
author: Stakefast
created_time: February 12, 2023, 12:09:18 PMLast edit: February 12, 2023, 05:53:28 PM by Stakefast
content: I proudfully present to youCRASHSCORESCRASHSCORE FeaturesRealtime Crash Game Statistics ofStakeBCGameRoobetI searched a long time for a website like this so I created it myself. I added the 3 most popular crash game crypto casinos, will add much more features and websites in the near future.It needs to collect a bit more data first to be able to work correctly.Watch Crash Game Statistics in RealtimeIf you have any suggestion, let me know

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: This is interesting! I am interested because I like playing crash games. It's perfect to see someone putting this together. Great job, OP!Maybe you can add on how frequently a "moon" happens on the websites supported by your site. With that, I would decide where I would play crash games.  Based on your screenshot, it's good to play in Roobet, and thankfully I do, lol. Hoping for that moon.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Interesting! Great initiative.What's the chance that you will get some more casino statistics too?

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: I see you are good at your game. I really commend your efforts and also recommend your site too as I see the features are alright. These three casinos you mentioned, are they the only casinos you are limited to? I said so because not everyone do gambling on their casinos so I would advise you make provision for others too so that they too can have ideas on their casinos. This would draw more traffic to your crash scores site.  How ever, I would like a situation whereby I can visit your website to see options for other casino games and their possible projection for games awaiting or pending.  OP I think from now you should expect huge traffic for this website and I hope you would be able to accommodate all.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: This is a good monitoring site, and it looks like Roobet is on the lead when it comes to hitting the moon. Looking forward to see other site that offers crash game, this is a good game actually and one of my favorite to play in stake. The site is so easy to navigate as well, it can be a big help to those who are looking for the actual numbers with those site especially with the crash game.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Incidentally, I like the Crash game at both bc games casino and Stake.com, it seems interesting to see the statistics between the two while paying attention and learning a little, at least come up with a new strategy to play later

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: It's a nice website to monitor real-time crash game results on many casinos.At the left and right side, you have casino names and their brand logos. I noticed that you did not have it in the middle for tabs in the Filter Websites area. I would like to see brand logo of each casino attached on each tab.Reasons for my suggestionNot all people are familiar and remember about each casino brand logo. Therefore if you don't attach it in Filter Websites tab, it's hard for people to differentiate crash game results on the left and right columns belong to what casino.Attaching brand logo for each casino tab will help better differentiation for website visitors.Bug?Click on each casino tab in Filter Website, at the Top 20 Moons, results are not filtered for that specific casino.In contrast, at the left side, results are filtered only for that chosen casino.Is it a bug for Top 20 Moons?

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Wow! This is a helpful website for a crash game player like me! There are still functions that aren't working on my end like the timeframe. I don't know if it's only me but I currently can't choose what time frame do I want to view from all of the listed casino. I also wish to have the bar chart enlarged, I have a small to average monitor and it's pretty difficult for me to see all of the casino current crashes. Overall I like the whole design and the idea of it, This is certainly helpful for crash game lovers! I'm pretty sure you will add other crash game providers such as bustabit which is the first and current crash game provider that I'm using.

comments.author: RILWAN
comments.body: Welcome on board mate, you have provided a great idea and this will be welcime by most members here who are crash lovers looking for statistics to make their decisions on.Am glad to have you here and looking for to some exciting time ahead for all the crash lovers in those forums.

That way you can get a strategy that is quite accurate and can be implemented because it's on two platforms gambling, of course the statistical movement will be slightly different so that it can create various kinds of new strategies to be able to play and win it.I myself still use one platform to play each game so I will try your way of observing statistics on two platforms at once and making a playing strategy.

comments.author: jpcfan

comments.body: I'm really impressed with your way of thinking on gambling stats. hope on this site you will list all gambling sites that have crash game. even the ones with no affiliate programs. those site stats matter too(if you care about stats).like your first site listing crypto gambling sites, you only list ones with refer ptogram. so the lost will always be incomplete.would it kill you to list sites with no refers?anyways, keep up the good work.

comments.author: klidex

That way you can get a strategy that is quite accurate and can be implemented because it's on two platforms gambling, of course the statistical movement will be slightly different so that it can create various kinds of new strategies to be able to play and win it.I myself still use one platform to play each game so I will try your way of observing statistics on two platforms at once and making a playing strategy.yes even though I know that the bookie will always win, at least play wisely and for fun, the most important thing is to be consistent when winning to stop playing and withdraw funds as soon as possible, lolWe, as gamblers, cannot beat the dealer, but we can still minimize losses and loss rates so that the dealer doesn't win too much or take the money we have by applying some good playing strategies, whether in Crash or other games, we still have to prioritize strategy.I have implemented the advice you said some time ago and until now I have managed to keep my money from disappearing with a large nominal amount. I have also said this in other threads on this forum.Hopefully in the future more and more gamblers will realize that self-control and financial control in gambling are very important.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: good job mate!you managed to create a website about statistics of gambler's favorite games like never before.so far, there has never been a website that displays realtime Crash game statistics on all gambling platforms. this site can help other gamblers to check which casino has the highest score and try to bet on the casino with the highest score.this is really something useful and very good to maintain and develop. because the game Crash is a game that has long been a favorite game of many gamblers. and the existence of this site will help new gamblers to find a casino that has the highest score on the game Crash.keep it up!

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: You've done really well at creating such a site, kudos buddy, though the site seems like its currently heavy, its having a pretty hard time with responsiveness, I understand that its a new site and that as time goes on, a lot of things will be improved and more features implemented, but just take this as my little and quick review of the site, overall, the design is very good, one can never go wrong with dark background.Kudos again.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Great website. With those color lines, I'm not sure if I am colorblind that blue and green near to each other looks like the same or it's just me but if I can suggest some other color, make the blue or the green one into yellow to make it more appearing.That can easily distinguish the chart for people like me that might have hard time looking at the chart. Other than that, you've done well by making this stats (real time) from the three crash sites that you've got. More to come and good luck.

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: This is very interesting, especially for us who like to chase high payouts. I'm trying to remember when and where I saw something like this, but it was too long ago. Mostly x1000 doesn't come that often, and x10k or more comes maybe once a day... with the help of these statistics, we can see how long it has been since the last big crash, in case it has been a long time, we start chasing some higher payouts. I like the idea, but the site could be much better arranged. It's a bit slow for me (I am not sure cause of me or your site), but I will bookmark it. I like to chase high payouts from time to time, and this site looks like a perfect start... before playing I would like to know the highest crashes in the last hours.Good luck Stakefast. I would like to see you take this site to some higher level.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on February 12, 2023, 06:48:59 PMYou've done really well at creating such a site, kudos buddy, though the site seems like its currently heavy, its having a pretty hard time with responsiveness, I understand that its a new site and that as time goes on, a lot of things will be improved and more features implemented, but just take this as my little and quick review of the site, overall, the design is very good, one can never go wrong with dark background.Kudos again.Hoping to see more reputable casinos in the chart. But as a newly-launched crash stat site, this is nice. For sure, some crash players will get motivated to play if they see the top 20 moons on the other side.But lets admit that when such thousands multiplier comes, usually we already cash even before that like at least getting the 100x payout.I usually play this in manual mode so I can skip some rounds that I feel I will crash very early. You can already see that when you start getting the 50x, the frequency is getting low, almost flat like in the range of 1-5x.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: It's good to see Stake here, I hope to see Betfury added beside Stake Betfury Crash game is very popular among its loyal players this is the first real-time Crash Game Statistics and I'm sure you are a Crash game fan, this is a good tool to have an insight on where is the best place to play Crashgame I think its a must tool for Crash game enthusiast, one of the most exciting games in an online casino.
